tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
    ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    film_screening_id UUID,
    ticket_price DECIMAL,
    quantity_sold INT
)

CREATE TABLE film_screening (
   screening_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   film_name VARCHAR (100),
   screening_date TIMESTAMP,
   available_seats INT
)

CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
   ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   screening_id UUID REFERENCES film_screening(screening_id),
   ticket_price DECIMAL,
   customer_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Screening (
    screening_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    film_id INT NOT NULL,
    screening_date DATE NOT NULL,
    screening_time TIME NOT NULL,
    ticket_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE film_screenings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    film_name VARCHAR(255),
    screening_date DATE,
    available_tickets INT,
    sold_tickets INT
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    screening_id INT,
    ticket_number INT,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    sale_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    screening_id INT,
    ticket_sale_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Tickets (
    ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    film_id UUID,
    customer_id UUID,
    ticket_quantity INT,
    ticket_total_price DECIMAL
);
